name: tourist-safety-backend
description: Smart Tourist Safety Monitoring & Incident Response System Backend

scripts.build: echo 'Building Edge Functions...' && supabase functions deploy --no-verify-jwt
scripts.deploy:functions: supabase functions deploy auth-register && supabase functions deploy auth-login && supabase functions deploy location-update && supabase functions deploy geofence-check && supabase functions deploy geofence-manage && supabase functions deploy incident-report && supabase functions deploy incident-manage && supabase functions deploy alert-send
scripts.type-check: echo 'Type checking Edge Functions...' && find supabase/functions -name '*.ts' -exec deno check {} \;
scripts.setup: npm run db:reset && npm run deploy:functions
